#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#define ll long long int
#define mod 1000000007
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
 
ll fib[100];
ll ans[100100]={0};
 
int main()
{
	ll t;
	ll i,j,k;
	fib[0] = 1;
	fib[1] = 2;
	for(i = 2; i <= 30; i++)
	{
		fib[i] = fib[i - 1] + fib[i - 2];
	}
	
	ans[0] = 1;
	for(i = 0; i < 25; i++)
	{
		for(k = 1; k <= 100000; k++)
		{
			if(k >= fib[i])
			{
				ans[k] = (ans[k - fib[i]] + ans[k]) % mod;
			}
		}
	}
	
	scanf("%lld", &t);
		
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n,m;
		cin >> n >> m;
		cout << (ans[n] - ans[n - m] + mod) % mod << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
